sentences.sContent: You'll have to change to the trolleybus next stop.
sentences.sContent_eng: You'll have to change to the trolleybus next stop.
sentences.sCn: 你下一站得改乘无轨电车。

sentences.sContent: The new trolleybus line was routed through the commercial district.
sentences.sContent_eng: The new trolleybus line was routed through the commercial district.
sentences.sCn: 新的无轨电车路线规定要通过商业区。

sentences.sContent: When in Pyongyang, Jong Tae-se, a Japanese-born forward who plays for the J-League team Kawasaki Frontale, travels to training by subway and trolleybus.
sentences.sContent_eng: When in Pyongyang, Jong Tae-se, a Japanese-born forward who plays for the J-League team Kawasaki Frontale, travels to training by subway and trolleybus.
sentences.sCn: 出生于日本、在日本J联赛中效力于川崎前锋队的前锋郑大世，在平壤时乘坐地铁和无轨电车去训练。

words.tran: 手推车；（美）无轨电车（等于streetear）；（英）有轨电车（等于trolleybus）；空中吊运车

trans.tranOther: a bus that uses power from electric wires above the street
